content: That's really helpful! I think I'll go with the Spring Fling cocktail, it sounds refreshing and perfect for the season. By the way, I've been experimenting with different flavors in my cooking class, focusing on farm-to-table cuisine, and last week we made a beautiful spring vegetable tart with a homemade crust. Do you have any suggestions on how to incorporate edible flowers into my dishes, I've been seeing them a lot in restaurants lately and they add such a nice touch?
